amendment.description: Amendment requires the Agency for Health Care Policy and Research internet web site to provide linkages to consumer satisfaction agencies that perform evaluations on health care quality.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 12 printed in the Congressional Record to establish linkages on the World Wide Web site maintained by the Director to consumer satisfaction agencies or other entities that perform evaluations on health care quality, HMO'S, and includes a link to the National Committee for Quality Assurance.

action.text: Andrews amendment (A002) modified by unanimous consent. The modification clarifies that the linkages must meet appropriate criteria.
On agreeing to the Andrews amendment (A002) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
